author: dao.coders
title: DAO-NET: DAO Token Market
description: To create value and a market, DAO-Net funding tokens require integration with existing DeFi solutions.

f6_assessments.q0:
Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) an organization that was designed to be automated and decentralized.
As proposer wants to reate value and a market, DAO-Net funding tokens require integration with existing DeFi solutions is great idea,
By integrating DAO-NET Tokens with existing DEX it will be huge advantage and helpful ADA community,
As DAO designed for  automating and decentralization it will increase market value from automated market makers, facilitate the exchange of DAO Tokens for ADA,
Idea is impressive as integrating automaton in ADA effectively,
This proposal effectively addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
DAO coders having experienced team in Blockchain developers, Plutus pioneers, Veteran Community Advisors and Solutions Analysts and working in previous  round funding for several DAO-NET suite proposals which is excellent,
...
As DAO Token Market funds will be used in Cardano Dapps to support business solution will be very helpful in development,
And there will be significant development and increase in mainnet activity as part of the DAO-NET suite of applications.


...
As risk of delivering project is less it will be great idea to implement,
Given experience and plan presented it is highly likely this proposal will be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2:
They have provided detailed budget breakdown and timeline of project,
As provided plan from May to October is impressive,
From Outreaching to existing DEX and AMM providers for DAO token market services to Launching DAO token market bootstrap smart contract is explained in detailed,
..
Budget planning is also reasonable,
Team members are also impressive including manager and developer,


..
And for auditing number of Initial DAO Token holders are able to exchange DAO tokens for 0.25 ADA each using the bootstrap DAO Token Market smart contract will be provided,

with all the presented idea and  information provided is sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
Projects align well with challenges through meeting the real business need for a starting market for the tokens in the DAO-NET, that increase efficiency, transparency, and stakeholder engagement, expand business to new areas.
The key metrics listed in the project like involving companies partnering with Dex and AMM,.. are also consistent with the key metric of the challenge.
The mechanism of The DAO Token Market project is presented quite specifically, the specific features of the proposal with the traditional initial token are also clearly analyzed so that readers can understand the difference of the proposal.
The risks related interest and the value proposition for DAO tokens are also analyzed and have a specific solution.
f6_assessments.q1:
Feasibility part is well presented.
The project's roadmap is quite detailed and is divided into 6 small phases lasting 6 months so that readers can have a better idea of the project's progress.
The necessary position requirements and information about current team members are also fully described with information about the field, work experience and attached to profiles on social networking sites such as LinkedIn.
However, the budget section subsections are quite general, I think it will be easier for readers to assess the feasibility of the project if the cost section for items includes more detailed information (estimated completion time, hourly unit prices...)
f6_assessments.q2:
The author presents quite enough information to track project progress.
Specifically, the community can track the project's progress with indicators such as the total number of pull requests in Github, total numbers of Github commits and the total number of errors fixed. Additionally, project progress will be tracked using agile methodology and weekly team meetings.
However, the success of the described project is still somewhat general, it would be better if more specific quantitative indicators were added so that the reader could easily compare and judge whether the project had accomplished its goals or not.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer wants to Integrate DAO-NET Tokens with existing DEX and Automated Market Makers, to facilitate the exchange of DAO Tokens for ADA. By this movement of DAO tokens and ADA starts in the market , As tokens and ADA moves in the market it will stabilize the cost of these tokens, by which people will get more confident in exchanging the tokens, where in future even small scale vendors can also use these tokens, which will be great asset to both ADA and DAO tokens, even these tokens can also be exchanged among developers to use some of the online tools for development of the project, hence This proposal effectively addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
The only major task is to convenience DEX and AMM providers for DAO token market services, Where most of the task gets completed.
Later DAO Coders Inc who has experienced team of Blockchain developers, Plutus pioneers, Veteran Community Advisors and Solutions Analysts can complete the rest task without any difficulty.
After partnering with AMM and DEX further getting funds won't be a difficult one , with which maintenance task can be done on the server, since DAO team continuously implementing projects since Fund 8 , with given experience and plan presented it is highly likely this proposal will be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposer has explained how they want to bring the DAO-NET tokens and ADA a stabilized value ,By partnering with right members such as DEX and Automated Market Makers, and help in bringing fluidity for cardano in the market.
The proposer has displayed some of the projects implemented by DAO's team since Fund 8 , which shows experience of this team in such projects.
The proposer has mentioned about roadmap and budget distribution of the project with proper leads of each team, hence the information provided is sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This team is proposing a DAO token market. Since this challenge is seeking solutions that increase efficiency, transparency, and stakeholder engagement as well as expand business to new areas, this proposal fits into this challenge.  The added value of the idea is clear from the description, but in order to better assess the impact, it would be good if the proposer differentiates this idea from other similar projects and approaches.
f6_assessments.q1: The provided plan gives an idea of the project. However, too few details are known about what the mechanism and processes will actually look like. Therefore, the scope of the project and, from that, the likelihood of successful implementation is not completely clear. The leadership of the team appears to be experienced. However, it appears from the proposal that some important positions are still unfilled.
f6_assessments.q2: There is a resource linked that contains a larger overview of this project and related projects. The roadmap and deliverables are clearly defined. It would still be helpful to link a documentation source like Github in the proposal. Auditability is therefore possible but could be improved.

solution: Integrate DAO-NET Tokens with existing DEX and Automated Market Makers to facilitate the exchange of DAO Tokens for ADA.
experience: DAO Coders Inc is an experienced team of Blockchain developers, Plutus pioneers, Veteran Community Advisors and Solutions Analysts that was incorporated after previous round funding for several DAO-NET suite proposals.
